statements: UPDATE traffic_flow_data SET vehicle_count = 100, avg_speed = 60.5 WHERE location_id = 1 AND time_stamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00';

UPDATE traffic_sensor_data SET vehicle_count = 100, average_speed = 35.5 WHERE sensor_id = 1
